entry.title: Bio Brightener Baked Powder
entry.summary:
Vendor: W3ll People
Type: Highlighter
Price: 25.00

This ultra-smooth baked powder is what dreams are made of. It provides invisible coverage with a matte radiance that blurs imperfections and minimizes pores. Brush it on for a soft, luminous, healthy glow that imparts a flawless, no-makeup makeup look. The feather light texture feels weightless on skin and blends effortlessly. Magnolia Bark and Squalane enliven and nourish the complexion for long term benefits.

• Vegan, Gluten free, Cruelty-free

• No Petrochemicals, Artificial Preservatives, GMO, Parabens, Dyes, Fragrance, Sulphates, Pthalates, Glycols, Nano Particles

• Made in the USA

Ingredients

Mica, Zea Mays Starch / Zea Mays (Corn) Starch*, Octyldodecanol, Pentylene Glycol, Hectorite, Squalane, Lauroyl Lysine, Plyglyceryl- 3 Diisostearate, Potassium Sorbate, Honokiol, Lactic Acid, Aqua/ Water. MAY CONTAIN +/-: CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, CI 77491 / Iron Oxides, CI 77492 / Iron Oxides, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides

Directions

Use W3LL PEOPLE Kabuki Brush. Swipe brush onto powder. Work powder evenly into brush by swirling it in makeup cap. Use confident, downward strokes moving from the outside in.

entry.title: Bio Baked Bronzer Powder
entry.summary:
Vendor: W3ll People
Type: Bronzer
Price: 25.00

This ultra-smooth baked bronzer provides natural color with soft matte radiance. Wake up the complexion with a healthy glow. The modern, multi-dimensional finish imparts a hint of soft luminosity while balancing skin tone. Revolutionary baked powder formula adheres like a cream for long-lasting wear without oxidizing.

• Vegan, Gluten free, Cruelty-free

• No Petrochemicals, Artificial Preservatives, GMO, Parabens, Dyes, Fragrance, Sulphates, Pthalates, Glycols, Nano Particles

• Made in the USA

Ingredients

Mica, Zea Mays Starch / Zea Mays (Corn) Starch*, Octyldodecanol, Pentylene Glycol, Hectorite, Squalane, Lauroyl Lysine, Plyglyceryl- 3 Diisostearate, Potassium Sorbate, Honokiol, Lactic Acid, Aqua/ Water MAY CONTAIN +/-: CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, CI 77491 / Iron Oxides, CI 77492 / Iron Oxides, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides

Directions

Use W3LL PEOPLE Kabuki Brush. Swipe brush onto powder. Work powder evenly into brush by swirling it in makeup cap. Apply below cheekbones and round up to temples in a “C” shape. Use alone or over foundation to balance skin tone and create a natural, healthy color with soft matte radiance.

entry.title: Nudist Multi-Use Duo
entry.summary:
Vendor: W3ll People
Type: Makeup
Price: 25.00

This magic, multi-tasking vegan cosmetic adds gorgeous sheer, natural color to cheeks, lips, and eyes. Rich in skin-soothing organic aloe + antioxidants to hydrate and improve overall skin quality. The creamy formula has a satiny smooth, weightless texture – free from all harsh, artificial chemicals and petroleum.

Enjoy premium, high-performance organic botanicals that provide weightless all-day wear with no creasing.

• Blush, eyeshadow and lip stain all-in-one

• Flattering nude shades for all ages and skin tones

• Quick & easy application; blends beautifully with fingertips

• Vegan, Hypoallergenic, Cruelty Free & Noncomedogenic

• EWG Verified for non-toxic health and safety

Free From: Parabens, Gluten, GMOs, Phthalates, Sulfates, Fragrance, Pheonoxyethanol, Dimethicone, PEG, Propylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Lead, Mineral Oil, Talc.

Ingredients

Helianthus Annus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil*, Candelilla (Euphorbia Cerifera) Wax, Copernica Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax*, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Shorea Robusta Resin, Rhus Verniciflua Peel Wax, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Fruit*, Silica, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil*, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil*, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch*, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf*, Matricaria Chamomilla (Chamomile) Flowers*, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf*, Tocopherol, Phenethyl Alcohol, Ethyhexylglycerin, +/- Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxide, Red 7

Warm and blend product onto eyes, cheeks, or lips using fingertips, or W3LL PEOPLE Foundation Brush

entry.title: Bio Booster Facial Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: W3ll People
Type: Facial Serum
Price: 29.00

Repair, rejuvenate, calm, hydrate, and protect your complexion with this incredibly powerful all-in-one active botanical serum! A seven-in-one everything formula powered by organic botanicals. Turmeric & Seabuckthorn strengthen the skin, organic Rose Hip & Pomegranate repair + rejuvenate, while Algae Complex & Rose Hip brighten + correct uneven skin tone.

• Primes + perfects skin surface with Broccoli Seed

• Soothes sensitive skin & calms Rosacea with Calendula + Carrot Seed

• Combats breakouts with organic Red Raspberry + Black Cumin

• Natural Ingredients

• Made in the USA with love

• Not tested on animals OR robots

• .34 oz / 10 ml

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulphates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles and bad mojo

Ingredients

Rosa Moschata (Rose hip) seed oil*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Fruit Oil*, Rubus Idaeus (Red Raspberry) Seed Oil*, Jojoba Oil/Macadamia Seed Oil Esters (and) Squalene (and) Phytosteryl Macadamiate (and) Phytosterols, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Brassica Oleracea Italica (Broccoli) Seed Oil, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract*, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil*, Calendula Officinalis Flower Oil*, Melaleuca Leucadendron Cajaputi (Cajaput) Oil*, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Oil*, Nigella sativa (Black Cumin) Seed Oil, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract*, Amyris Balsamifera (Amyris) Oil, Pelargonium Roseum Leaf (Rose Geranium) Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Neroli) Flower Oil, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Petitgrain) Leaf Oil, Pogostemon Cablin (Patchouli) Oil, Aniba Rosaeodora (Rosewood) Wood Oil, Santalum Album (Sandalwood) Oil, Canaga Odorata (Ylang Ylang) Flower Oil, Myroxylon Pereira (Balsam Peru) Resin. *Organic

Directions

Apply to freshly cleansed face morning and night. Add a drop or two to Bio Tint Multi-action Moisturizer for boosted skin treatment and flawless application. For a radiant finish and extra long wear, set with Bio Brightener Invisible Powder.

entry.title: Natural Contour + Highlight Duo

Vendor: W3ll People

Price: 25.00

The Natural Contour + Highlight Duo is the answer to complicated, over-the-top contouring palettes. The creamy good-for-you formulas are packed with therapeutic organic botanicals that help repair + rejuvenate skin, while emphasizing your best features. Create the illusion of higher cheekbones, slimmer nose, softer jawline and a smaller forehead.

[+/-: Mica, Iron Oxides (CI 77491, 77492, 77499) Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)]. *USDA Organic

To highlight, blend brightener cream onto the highest point of cheekbones, bridge of nose, and peak of forehead. •To add depth, lightly blend bronzer cream onto contour of cheeks, temples, sides of nose and jawline

entry.title: Liquid Eyeliner
entry.summary:
Vendor: W3ll People
Type: eyeliner
Price: 18.00

A fine felt-tip liquid liner that delivers ultimate precision in a premium, natural formula that doesn’t fade, flake or smudge. Organic rosemary and eyebright nourish and soothe sensitive eye area and an easy to use felt tip applicator glides evenly without dragging or tugging.

• Hyper pigmented for inky color that lasts long into the night

• Smudge-proof + Water resistant / No flaking

• EWG Verified for non-toxic health & safety

• NO creepy adhesives and petrochemicals typically found in conventional liquid eye liners

• Free From: Parabens, Gluten, GMO, Phthalates, Sulfates, Fragrance, Pheonoxyethanol, Dimethicone, PEG, Propylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Lead, Mineral Oil, Talc

• Made in the USA with love

• Not tested on animals OR robots

Ingredients

Water, Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Brassica Campestris/Aleurites Fordi Oil Copolymer, glyceryl Oleate Citrate, Glycerin, Methyl Dihydroabietate, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Cystine, Laurel Arginine, Bentonite Clay, Lactobacillue Ferment, Caprylyl Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Xanthum Gum, Caprylhydroxamic, Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Tocopherol (Natural Vitamin E), Rosmarinus Officials (Rosemary) Leaf Extract*, Euphrasia Officianalis Extract*, Leuconostoc Ferment Filtrate. *Certified Organic

Directions

Place felt tip as close to the lash line as possible for perfectly defined eyes. For ultra precise application draw short dashes along your lash line in lieu of one long swoop. The dashes should extend slightly past the outer corners of your eyes for a classic eye, and beyond for a dramatic cat eye.

entry.title: Bio Tint Multi-Action Moisturizer SPF 30
entry.summary:
Vendor: W3ll People
Type: Tinted Moisturizer
Price: 29.00

Achieve one-step perfection with this breakthrough natural makeup / skin care hybrid. Active phytonutrients and pure zinc protect, brighten, hydrate and improve skin quality while diminishing imperfections. Enjoy a flawless, natural, more radiant complexion with this luxurious, organic, plant-based wonder.

Organic coconut boosts skin hydration while organic pomegranate helps rejuvenate and provide antioxidant support, broccoli seed oil smooths and brightens the complexion, algae extracts combat hyper-pigmentation / discoloration, and organic Ginseng anti-oxidizes and revitalizes skin.

• SPF 30 broad spectrum protection with pure zinc

• Advanced bio-peptide complex boosts collagen

• Premium natural pigments correct imperfections

• Hypoallergenic, Cruelty Free & Noncomedogenic

• Free From: Parabens, Avobenzone, Oxybenzone, Gluten, GMOs, Phthalates, Sulfates, Fragrance, Pheonoxyethanol, Dimethicone, Petrolatum, PEG, Propylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Mineral Oil, Talc, Nanoparticles

Ingredients

Zinc Oxide 20% Other Ingredients: Water, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Silica, Castor (Ricinus Communis) Oil, Glycerin, Shea Butter Ethyl Esters, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Brassica Oleracea Italica (Broccoli) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Magnesium Sulfate, Isostearic Acid, Lecithin, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Gluconolactone, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, CONTAINS 1% OR LESS OF EACH OF THE FOLLOWING: Tocopheryl Acetate, Isoamyl Laurate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil*, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Sodium Benzoate, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Tribehenin, Punica Granatum (Pomegrante) Seed Oil*, Bisabolol, Isoamyl Cocoate, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Phytic Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Ceramide NG, Calendula Officinalis (Marigold) Flower Extract*, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract*, Panax Quinquefolium Root Extract*, Calcium Gluconate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextin, Algae Extract, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12 *Certified organic May Contain (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxide (CI77492),Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxide (CI 77499)

entry.title: Bio Correct Multi-Action Concealer
entry.summary:
Vendor: W3ll People
Type: Concealer
Price: 23.00

W3LL PEOPLE's latest conventional-busting cosmetic, Bio Correct Multi-action Concealer. This power-packed natural wonder provides serious coverage to banish any skin imperfections or blemishes. The difference is its ultra light, mousse texture that blends onto skin with minimal effort. It sets like a dream without creasing or budging for all day wear.

Bonus: it actually depuffs, brightens and improves skin texture while it conceals with a robust cocktail of organic algae, coffee, pomegranate and anti-aging peptides! You’ll especially love the dramatic improvement to your appearance by diminishing darkness around the eye for a fresh, bright-eyed, rested look. Like all W3LL PEOPLE cosmetics, it is free from harsh artificial chemicals like parabens, propylene glycol and dimethicone.

• Blends easily to instantly camouflage imperfections and redness

• Provides maximum coverage for up to 8 hours with no streaking or creasing

• Improves texture and smoothes fine lines with advanced peptide complex

• Brightens and combats hyperpigmentation with organic algae extracts

• Soothes and calms sensitive skin with organic aloe, calendula and chamomile

• Depuffs with caffeine

• Made in the USA with love

• Petroleum-free, Phthalate-free, Talcum-free, Paraben-free, No Fragrance Added

• Not tested on animals OR robots

Ingredients

Caster Isostearate Beeswax Succinate, Coco-Caprylate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isononyl Isononanoate, Glyceryl Dibehenate, Silica, Isostearyl Alcohol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Glyceryl Behenate, Butylene Glycol Cocoate, Ethylcellulose, Alaria Esculenta Extract, Glyceryl Caprylate, Glyceral Undecylenate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Ceramide NG, Palmitoyl Hexapaptide 12, Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Seed Oil, Punica Gerantum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil*, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil*, Water Camellia Oleifera (Green Tea) Leaf Extract*, Glycerin, Ginsing Root Extract*, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract*, Chamomila Recutita (Matricaris) Flower Extract*, Algae Extract*, Trihydroxystearin, Hexylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthum Gum, triethoxycaprylylsilane, Tribehenin. [+/- Titanium, Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI77492, 77491, 77499)] *Certified Organic

Directions

Apply onto under eye and eye lids to conceal dark circles and brighten eyes. Use as a spot corrector to promote an even skin tone and reduce redness. Warm and blend onto the face using fingertips, or W3LL PEOPLE Foundation brush. Gently tap and blend product onto the complexion until desired effect is achieved. TIPS: 1) Dust with W3LL PEOPLE Bio Brightener Invisible Powder for long-last wear. 2) Use as eyeshadow primer. 3) Add a small dab to tinted moisturizer or liquid foundation to boost coverage

entry.title: Fall / Winter Natural Color Pop Lip + Cheek - Pink
entry.summary:
Vendor: W3ll People
Type: Makeup Kit
Price: 40.00

Given the fact that our skin absorbs around 80% of what we put on it, the people at W3LL PEOPLE created a line of superior quality cosmetics without using potentially harmful artificial chemicals found in most conventional makeup. Handcrafted in small batches in the USA, you will find only the finest quality, all-natural, high-performance formulations, which effortlessly deliver flawless coverage and soothing protection (in addition to being unbelievably light). Unrivaled in delivering a natural "no-makeup" look, when using the W3LL PEOPLE line you don't just look good, you feel good.

W3LL PEOPLE has curated a strategic combination of colors to call out lips, cheeks or eyes consisting of the most classically feminine shade: pink. This special makeup set includes the multi-tasking, Universalist Multi-Use Stick in Creamy Pink and a Clear Bio Extreme Lipgloss. With these two products, you can easily create a multitude of flattering looks to pop your lips, eyes or cheeks.

Tip: This set integrates perfectly with the Natural Beauty Essentials Kit to give it a colorful kick.

Kit Includes: Universalist Multi-Use Stick 1 in Creamy Pink + Bio Extreme Lipgloss in Natural/Clear.

• 100% Natural + Petroleum-free

• Sustainably made in the USA with love

• Not tested on animals OR robots

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulfates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, or nanoparticles. 

Ingredients

Universalist Multi-Use Stick 1: Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Cera Alba (Bees- wax), Silica, Mica (CI 77019), Olea europaea (Olive Oil)*, Castor Isostearate Beeswax Succinate **, Camellia Oleifera (Camellia) Seed Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil*, Mica (CI 77019), Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil (and) Organic Aloe Barbadenis (Aloe) Extract, Essential Oil blend, Tocopherol (Natural Vitamin E), Lysine, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea)*, Roman An- themis Nobilis (Chamomile)* [+/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, 77492, 77499), Carmine (CI 75470), Manganese Violet (CI 77742)].

Bio Extreme Lipgloss: Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut Oil), Vitis Vinifera (Grape Seed Oil), Silica, Ethylhexyl Palmitate (and) Tribehenin (and) Sorbitan Isosterarate (and) Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Mixed Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Barbadensis (Aloe Vera Gel), Mentha Piperita Essential (Peppermint) Oil and Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Oil (and) Illicium Verum (Star Anise) Oil (and) Gaultheria Procumberis (Wintergreen) Oil, Mica (and) Titanium Dioxide.

Directions

1. Apply W3LL PEOPLE Universalist Multi-Stick - Warm and blend product onto the face using fingertips, or W3LL PEOPLE Foundation, Lip, or Eye brushes. Blend onto cheeks, eyes, or lips and build to the desired level of color impact.

2. Finish with W3LL PEOPLE Bio Extreme Lipgloss -  Apply liberally to lips or layer on top of W3LL PEOPLE Universalist Multi-Stick.

Mica, Iron Oxides, Titanium Dioxide. May contain Ultramarine Blue, Ferric Ferrocyanide, Aloe Barbadenis Powder (Aloe)*, Matricaria recutita (Chamomile)**, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea)* *USDA Organic, **QAI

Directions

Dip makeup brush tip into jar and collect a small amount of powder. Work powder evenly into brush by swirling brush in makeup cap. Apply below cheekbones and round up to temples in a “C” shape. Finish by lightly applying remaining amount to the forehead, nose, chin.

entry.title: Hypnotist Eyeliner

Vendor: W3ll People
Type: Makeup
Price: 19.00

Easily blends to create a seductive, smoky eye. Hypnotist is designed to be moisturizing and nourishing to the eye area without the harsh chemicals and skin-aging adhesives found in most eye cosmetics.

For big, round eyes, apply liner to upper and lower lids without touching at the corner. For almond-shaped eyes/smaller eyes, apply liner only to the upper lids and lash line.
